actions.prompt: Create a 5 sentence of the position, focus on the key matches to my role and anything that stands out as a key miss:
actions.title: Job Summary

actions.prompt: Do a very quick review a provide a fit match for the job position:
actions.title: Fit Match

actions.prompt: Think longer, be critical, and provide a more in-depth fit match for the job posting:
actions.title: Critical Match

actions.prompt: Create a summary of the company found in the text, keep it short to 5 sentences:
actions.title: Company Summary
